metadata.title: CVE-2016-1249 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The DBD::mysql module before 4.039 for Perl, when using server-sideprepared statement support, allows attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) via vectors involving an unaligned number ofplaceholders in WHERE condition and output fields in SELECT expression.

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
